issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.Mashups> Facebook
2.Log in, then do the query test or properties test

results: runtime error:

comments.body:
{html}

(from [9fba2f7d838dc27e5994dabe38cc943ee8470709]) [#2161 state:fixed-in-qa] wrapped iPhone only features. Removed old code for ImageView because Android supports the image property now. Also limited the query to 20 results. If you have a big facebook account it takes forever to get through them all. https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/9fba2f7d838d...

{html}
